item.title: Fresh Raspbian Installation
item.description: Fresh Raspbian Image Burn the image in an SD Card You can use my script: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TediCreations/.dotfiles/master/files/bin/utils/writeSDCard writeSDCard ~/rasbian.img Enable headless ssh Add a file named “ssh” inside the /boot directory. Add a file named “wpa_supplicant.conf” inside the /boot directory with the following contents. ctrl_interface=DIR=/var/run/wpa_supplicant GROUP=netdev update_config=1 country=us network={ ssid="<Name of your WiFi>" psk="<Password for your WiFi>" scan_ssid=1 } Make it secure Change the default password of user pi
